alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 02 at 10:12PM EST until January 02 at 11:45PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EST FOR COOK...BERRIEN...NORTHWESTERN LOWNDES...SOUTHEASTERN THOMAS... BROOKS AND SOUTHEASTERN COLQUITT COUNTIES... At 1012 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Alapaha to 9 miles southwest of Boston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Adel, Quitman, Valdosta, Hahira, Sparks, Boston, Enigma, Lenox, Alapaha, Pavo, Morven, Berlin, Barwick, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Greggs, Everett and Empress. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EST for south central Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 300 AM EST for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
